title: $2,300 / 3br - Lakeside 3-Bedroom Apartment with a Large Sunny Kitchen
posting_body: This spacious top floor duplex unit is located within a stone's throw away from Oakland's beautiful Lake Merritt.

Ideally situated between I-880 and I-580 in the Merritt neighborhood of Oakland, you can enjoy the best that Oakland has to offer in local dining, outdoor events, art & culture; all of which are within minutes from your doorstep.
The apartment has a fresh coat of paint and is ready for occupancy.
Tile flooring in the bathroom and kitchen, and recently shampooed carpeted floors throughout the unit.
The open kitchen/dining room layout has tons of natural light and comes with granite counter tops, new appliances (fridge, gas stove/oven combo, water heater)
Gated front entry with access to a shared side and front yard.
Tenants are responsible for water and PG&E
A minimum credit score of 670 is required (No delinquency, collection, evictions or other negative remarks).
$40 application fee for each applicant 18 years and older.
Email to setup an appointment for showing (Masks required)
